title: To see the end product of a "diverse" workplace, look no further than Mass Effect Andromeda
body:
https://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/228/203/9ba.jpg

40 million dollar budget spent on paying a bunch of SJW blowhards who screwed around and did a terrible(and meme-worthy) job, causing not only the colossal failure of Mass Effect Andromeda, but the death of Mass Effect as an IP. Just a glimpse into the future boys.

{{sticker:sg-lulu}} 

Can we not go down this path, Riot?
